name: Seeing Red Redux
description:
A non-monochromatic game, where you get a powerup which makes objects appear for 60 seconds. Then you have to go back though the level or go forward with new obstacles.

🔔Set Webpage Zoom to 75%!🔔

Now with 60-second timer!

-Controls-

Left and right arrows-Move

Up Arrow-Jump and double jump

T-Go to Title

Enter-continue dialogue

-Credits-

Music from:Bensound

-Others-

Original Game:https://joedafarmer.itch.io/seeing-red
